types.html:
sortie de route f (plural sorties de route)

  1. usually benign car accident where a car leaves the road without colliding with other vehicles
    faire une sortie de route ― to come off the road
  2. (figuratively) This term needs a translation to English. Please help out and add a translation, then remove the text {{rfdef}}.

See also

[edit]
  • accident de parcours
  • embardée
  • finir dans le décor
